verbs.description: [ARG1: russia richest] [V: are] [ARG2: world best at making money] the mood among the average russian may be souring with inflation eating into their purchasing power but the country richest are world beaters when it comes to making money producer money u s moscow britain china novatek lukoil ukraine brexit devon pendleton russia chairman leonid mikhelson vagit alekperov gennady timchenko pei yi mak
